# Support

## Getting Help

- **Bug reports**: [Open an issue](https://github.com/antropos17/Aegis/issues/new?template=01-bug-report.yml)
- **Feature requests**: [Open an issue](https://github.com/antropos17/Aegis/issues/new?template=02-feature-request.yml)
- **Agent submissions**: [Submit new agent](https://github.com/antropos17/Aegis/issues/new?template=03-new-agent.yml)
- **General questions**: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/antropos17/Aegis/discussions)

## Before Opening an Issue

1. Search [existing issues](https://github.com/antropos17/Aegis/issues) first
2. Include your OS, Electron version, and steps to reproduce
3. Attach screenshots if relevant (especially from the Shield or Activity tab)
